symptoms.name: Fever
symptoms.description: Elevated body temperature, often a sign of infection or inflammation.

symptoms.name: Cough
symptoms.description: A sudden, forceful expulsion of air from the lungs, typically caused by respiratory infections or irritants.

symptoms.name: Shortness of Breath
symptoms.description: Difficulty breathing, which may indicate respiratory, cardiovascular, or other systemic issues.

symptoms.name: Fatigue
symptoms.description: Persistent tiredness and lack of energy, often associated with various medical conditions.

symptoms.name: Muscle or Joint Pain
symptoms.description: Aching or discomfort in muscles or joints, which can be caused by infections, inflammation, or other factors.

symptoms.name: Headache
symptoms.description: Pain or discomfort in the head, often due to tension, migraines, or other underlying causes.

symptoms.name: Nausea and Vomiting
symptoms.description: Feeling of sickness and the act of expelling stomach contents, commonly caused by infections, pregnancy, or other factors.

symptoms.name: Diarrhea
symptoms.description: Frequent, loose, or watery bowel movements, often caused by infections, dietary issues, or other factors.

symptoms.name: Skin Rash
symptoms.description: Change in the skin's appearance, texture, or color, which may result from allergies, infections, or other causes.

symptoms.name: Swelling
symptoms.description: Abnormal enlargement of body parts, often caused by inflammation, fluid retention, or other factors.

symptoms.name: Weight Loss or Gain
symptoms.description: Unintentional loss or gain of body weight, which may indicate underlying health issues.

symptoms.name: Chest Pain
symptoms.description: Discomfort or pain in the chest area, which could be related to heart, lung, or digestive issues.

symptoms.name: Vision Changes
symptoms.description: Alterations in vision, such as blurriness, double vision, or loss of vision, which may result from eye conditions or systemic diseases.

symptoms.name: Difficulty Swallowing
symptoms.description: Sensation of blockage or discomfort while swallowing, often associated with throat infections, gastroesophageal reflux, or other conditions.

symptoms.name: Changes in Urination
symptoms.description: Variations in urination patterns, such as frequency, color, or pain, which may indicate urinary tract infections, kidney issues, or diabetes.

symptoms.name: Sore Throat
symptoms.description: Pain, irritation, or scratchiness in the throat, often caused by infections like strep throat or viral illnesses.

symptoms.name: Chills
symptoms.description: Uncontrollable shivering or cold sensation, often accompanying fever and indicating an infection.

symptoms.name: Dizziness
symptoms.description: Feeling lightheaded, unsteady, or off-balance, which can result from various factors, including inner ear problems or low blood pressure.

symptoms.name: Nasal Congestion
symptoms.description: Blockage or stuffiness in the nasal passages, commonly associated with respiratory infections or allergies.

symptoms.name: Sweating
symptoms.description: Excessive sweating beyond what is considered normal, often indicative of underlying health issues.

symptoms.name: Weakness
symptoms.description: Lack of physical or mental strength, often accompanied by fatigue, and may be caused by various medical conditions.

symptoms.name: Loss of Appetite
symptoms.description: Reduced desire to eat or lack of interest in food, which can be a symptom of infections, gastrointestinal issues, or mental health conditions.

symptoms.name: Confusion
symptoms.description: Mental state characterized by disorientation, lack of clarity, or difficulty thinking and making decisions, often associated with infections, neurological problems, or medication reactions.

symptoms.name: Chest Tightness
symptoms.description: Sensation of pressure or tightness in the chest, which could be related to heart-related issues, respiratory conditions, or anxiety.

symptoms.name: Unexplained Bruising or Bleeding
symptoms.description: Appearance of bruises or bleeding without obvious cause, which may indicate blood disorders, trauma, or other health conditions.

symptoms.name: Abdominal Pain
symptoms.description: Discomfort or pain in the abdominal area, which may indicate gastrointestinal, reproductive, or urinary tract issues.

symptoms.name: Sensitivity to Light or Sound
symptoms.description: Increased sensitivity to light (photophobia) or sound (phonophobia), often associated with migraines or certain neurological conditions.

symptoms.name: Swollen Lymph Nodes
symptoms.description: Enlarged lymph nodes, which may be a sign of infections, autoimmune diseases, or cancer.

symptoms.name: Numbness or Tingling
symptoms.description: Abnormal sensations of numbness or tingling in various body parts, often related to nerve compression, diabetes, or other neurological conditions.

symptoms.name: Changes in Bowel Habits
symptoms.description: Alterations in bowel movements, such as frequency, consistency, or color, which may indicate gastrointestinal disorders, dietary issues, or infections.

symptoms.name: Thirst
symptoms.description: Excessive feeling of needing to drink fluids, often associated with dehydration or certain medical conditions.

symptoms.name: Mood Changes
symptoms.description: Fluctuations in emotional state, such as irritability, sadness, or anxiety, which could be related to mental health conditions or other factors.

symptoms.name: Hair Loss
symptoms.description: Thinning or loss of hair from the scalp or other body parts, often caused by genetic factors, hormonal changes, or medical conditions.

symptoms.name: Dry Skin
symptoms.description: Skin that is rough, scaly, or lacks moisture, often resulting from environmental factors, skin conditions, or systemic issues.

symptoms.name: Frequent Infections
symptoms.description: Recurring or persistent infections, which may indicate a weakened immune system or underlying health conditions.

symptoms.name: Changes in Heartbeat
symptoms.description: Variations in heart rate, rhythm, or palpitations, which could be related to heart conditions, stress, or other factors.

symptoms.name: Swollen Joints
symptoms.description: Joint swelling and stiffness, often associated with arthritis, autoimmune diseases, or other inflammatory conditions.

symptoms.name: Pale Skin
symptoms.description: Skin that appears unusually pale or lacking color, which could indicate anemia, circulatory problems, or other medical issues.

symptoms.name: Trouble Sleeping
symptoms.description: Difficulty falling asleep or staying asleep, often related to insomnia, stress, or other sleep disorders.

symptoms.name: Excessive Thirst or Hunger
symptoms.description: Intense and persistent feelings of thirst or hunger, which could be symptoms of diabetes or other metabolic disorders.

symptoms.name: Restlessness
symptoms.description: Inability to sit still or constant movement, often associated with anxiety, hyperactivity, or certain medical conditions.

symptoms.name: Bloating
symptoms.description: Abdominal discomfort characterized by a feeling of fullness and tightness, often related to gastrointestinal issues, dietary factors, or hormonal changes.

symptoms.name: Itchy Skin
symptoms.description: Skin that is irritated and prone to scratching, which may result from allergies, skin conditions, or insect bites.

symptoms.name: Sudden Weight Change
symptoms.description: Rapid and unexplained gain or loss of weight, which could be related to underlying health conditions or changes in lifestyle.

symptoms.name: Blood in Stool or Urine
symptoms.description: Presence of blood in bowel movements or urine, which may indicate gastrointestinal bleeding, urinary tract issues, or other problems.

symptoms.name: Persistent Coughing or Sneezing
symptoms.description: Long-lasting coughing or sneezing, often associated with chronic respiratory conditions, allergies, or irritants.

symptoms.name: Hoarseness
symptoms.description: Raspy or rough voice, often caused by irritation of the vocal cords, infections, or other factors.

symptoms.name: Irregular Menstrual Cycle
symptoms.description: Changes in the timing, duration, or flow of menstrual periods, which may indicate hormonal imbalances, polycystic ovary syndrome (PCOS), or other conditions.

symptoms.name: Leg Swelling
symptoms.description: Abnormal enlargement of the legs, often caused by fluid retention or circulatory problems.

symptoms.name: Nausea after Eating
symptoms.description: Feeling of queasiness or discomfort in the stomach after consuming a meal.
